pages.home: The place to train your Touch Typing skills!!
pages.quotes: Practice typing with quotes using the enhanced quote system!
pages.code: Master programming syntax by typing real code with overtype-style visual feedback!
pages.alphabet: Practice typing with the full alphabet!
pages.custom: Practice typing with your own custom text!
pages.userstats: Track your typing progress, analyze performance trends, and visualize your keyboard usage patterns.

metrics.redKeysExplanation: Red keys show characters you had trouble with this game.

trigraphs.pleaseSelectTrigraph: Please select a trigraph to start typing.

quotes.title: Quote Typing Practice
quotes.description: Practice typing with inspirational quotes to improve your speed and accuracy.
quotes.getRandomQuotesEntireLanguage: Get random quotes from entire language

about.title: About TypeTutor
about.description: TypeTutor is a comprehensive typing trainer designed to help you improve your typing speed and accuracy through various practice modes.

userStats.title: Your Typing Statistics
userStats.description: Track your progress, identify areas for improvement, and see your typing patterns.
userStats.exportDescription: Export your statistics for backup or import previously exported data.
userStats.noGamesYet: No games completed yet. Start typing to see your history!
userStats.failedToLoad: Failed to load statistics. Please try again.
userStats.clearConfirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all statistics? This action cannot be undone.
userStats.failedToExport: Failed to export statistics. Please try again.
userStats.failedToImport: Failed to import statistics. Please check the file format.
userStats.failedToClear: Failed to clear statistics. Please try again.
userStats.keyboardHeatmapDescription: Visual representation of your overall typing performance across all games and modes. This shows accumulated data from all your typing sessions. Click on any key to see detailed statistics.

serverStats.title: Server Game Completion Statistics
serverStats.completeGamesToSee: Complete some typing games to see your progress!
